basics.name: Siddhardha Tagirisa
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer / Programmer
basics.summary: Software Engineer or Computer Programmer with 5 years of experience developing robust code for high-volume companies. A collaborative Full Stack Engineer specialized in agile development with computer science and engineering education at the National Institute of Technology, Rourkela.
expertise: Front End web design / UI and UX Design

work.summary: Axa is a French multinational insurance firm that engages in global insurance, investment management, and other financial services.
highlights: Renewals: Digital transformation and automation of insurance renewals for all AXA products through the development of a new generic platform powered by configuration, which increased the companyâ€™s renewals and revenues.
Microservices: Refactoring and adding new features to reduce technical debt and reduce request / response time by effectively using caching
Efficient Pricing: Increased efficiency in pricing products during the quotation phase by integrating machine learning into existing micro-services.
MyAXA Mobile App: Reduced the size of the MyAxa mobile application by using icons instead of images that result in reduced load time.

work.summary: Setuserv is a team of data scientists, engineers and consultants committed to harnessing the vast powers of machine learning to solve distinct problems.
highlights: Reporting: Developed a pipeline for storing and extracting information from raw text, leading to the elimination of manual labour.
Internal Tools: Built internal tools that are used by analytics managers to increase the accuracy of machine learning models.
Performance: Optimized most of the SQL queries already written using Django ORM, which in turn increased the performance by 40 per cent.

work.summary: Learnpedia is an edu-tech company that helps bridge the educational gap for students preparing competitive entrance exams.
highlights: Doubts Forum: Optimised doubt allocation and reduced response time from 7 days to 24 hours
Test Loading: Developed a mechanism for automating the loading effort of the tests, which reduced manual effort by 30 days for 5 people to 2 days.
UI: Revamped the key features of the website using the Material Design UI, which increased the SEO ranking and the number of landings on the product.
Internal Tools: Implemented numerous features to include market intelligence to promote easy decision-making.

work.summary: Scholas is a product developed for helping transform school administration from manual to digital.
highlights: Product: Developed core product from scratch using bootstrap 3 and ruby on rails.
Marketing: Strategically marketing to reduce the initial costs of the company.

work.summary: SchoolCom is a platform for the collection and analysis of student analytics for schools.
highlights: Bug Fixes: Fixed various small bugs in the analytics platform which was built using PHP.
Learning: Strengthened my methodology of development under guidance.

graduationProject.name: Improving Performance of Job Scheduling Algorithms in Cloud Computing Environment

currentlyWorkingOn.description: Implementing common data structures, sorting and searching algorithms in Java and Python for strengthening core concepts.
